alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Franklin, northeastern Wood, northwestern Upshur and southwestern Camp Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winnsboro, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Scroggins, Rosewood, Newsome, Perryville and Grice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
